title: F*ck it, let's get jobs (Part 2)
description:
Our Online Storytelling Course is officially on presale: https://momnt.io/36zeSxh
Use the code: tellbetterstories for an additional discount at checkout 

In October of 2019, we were ready to finally call it quits... but there were a few key things that happened over the next few months that turned everything around. This week we moved into a new studio, started hiring a team to work at our company and launched our first storytelling course. A lot is happening with Colin and Samir and we dive in to all of that on this episode of the podcast.
itunes:author: Colin and Samir
